origins.name: Chrono
origins.desc: All allies gain 15% Attack Speed every some seconds.

origins.name: Cybernetic
origins.desc: Cybernetic champions with at least one item gain Health and Attack Damage.

origins.name: Dark Star
origins.desc: When a Dark Star Champion dies, all other allied Dark Star Champions gain Attack Damage and Spell Power

origins.name: Mech-Pilot
origins.desc: The Super-Mech has the combined Pilots Health, Attack Damage, and Traits of its Pilots, as well as 3 random items from among them. When the Super-Mech dies the Pilots are ejected, continue to fight.

origins.name: Rebel
origins.desc: At the start of combat, Rebels gain a shield and increased damage for each adjacent Rebel. The shield lasts for 8 seconds.

origins.name: Celestial
origins.desc: All allies heal for some of the damage they deal with spells and attacks.

origins.name: Space Pirate
origins.desc: Whenever a Space Pirate lands a killing blow on a Champion there is a chance to drop extra loot.

origins.name: Star Guardian
origins.desc: Star Guardians' spellcasts grant Mana to other Star Guardians spread among them.

classes.name: Blaster
classes.desc: Every fourth Basic Attack from a Blaster fires additional attacks at random enemies. These additional attacks deal damage like Basic Attacks, trigger on-hit effects and can critically hit.

classes.name: Infiltrator
classes.desc: Innate: At the start of combat, Infiltrators move to the enemy's backline. Infiltrators gain Attack Speed for 6 seconds at the start of combat, refreshes on takedown

classes.name: Protector
classes.desc: Protectors shield themselves for 4 seconds whenever they cast a spell. This shield doesn't stack.

classes.name: Blademaster
classes.desc: Blademasters' Basic Attacks have a chance to trigger two additional attacks against their target. These additional attacks deal damage like Basic Attacks and trigger on-hit effects.

classes.name: Sorcerer
classes.desc: All allies have increased Spell Power.
